fixes.name: Ending CF
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR summaryTable =
    SUMMARIZE(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Subs],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Cash curr],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Maturity Date],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR],
        "FixedSum", SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[End Cash (in USD)])
    )
RETURN
    SUMX(summaryTable, [FixedSum])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau FIXED LOD aggregation to a DAX measure by summarizing the table at the FIXED dimensions and summing [End Cash (in USD)] per combination, then summing those fixed-level results. This replicates Sum({FIXED ...: SUM([End Cash (in USD)])}) behaviour in Tableau.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD aggregation and aggregation functions, which requires a measure in Power BI to preserve the aggregation/context behavior.
